anya-e0802n3:3_0: Yasmā vā apeti, yasmā vā bhayaṁ jāyate, yasmā vā ādatte,
anya-e0802n3:4_0: Taṁ yathā? Gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā, corā bhayaṁ jāyate,
anya-e0802n3:7_0: Dhātunāmānaṁ payoge ca upasaggayogādīsvapi ca taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n3:8_0: Dhātūnaṁ payoge tāva jiiccetassa dhātussa parāpubbassa payoge yo asaho, so apādānasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n3:10_0: Bhūiccetassa dhātussa papubbassa payoge yato acchinnappabhavo, so apādānasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n3:13_0: Taṁ yathā? Urasmā jāto putto, bhūmito niggato raso,
anya-e0802n3:13_1: ubhato sujāto putto mātito ca pitito ca.
anya-e0802n3:15_1: ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati upari pabbatā devo vassati,
anya-e0802n3:15_2: buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya bhikkhū ālapati temāsaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:16_1: Ito pakkhasmā vijjhati migaṁ luddako, kosā vijjhati kuñjaraṁ, māsasmā bhuñjati bhojanaṁ.
anya-e0802n3:17_0: Apiggahaṇena nipātapayogepi pañcamīvibhatti hoti dutiyā ca tatiyā ca.
anya-e0802n3:17_1: Rahitā mātujā puññaṁ katvā dānaṁ deti, rahitā mātujaṁ, rahitā mātujena vā.
anya-e0802n3:17_2: Rite saddhammā kuto sukhaṁ labhati, rite saddhammaṁ, rite saddhammena vā.
anya-e0802n3:17_4: vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati, vinā saddhammaṁ, vinā saddhammena vā. Vinā buddhasmā, vinā buddhaṁ, vinā buddhena vā.
anya-e0802n3:18_1: Yatohaṁ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jāto. Yato sarāmi attānaṁ, yato pattosmi viññutaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:18_2: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāsaveyyuṁ.
anya-e0802n3:21_0: Kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā, yavā paṭisedhenti gāvo.
anya-e0802n3:24_1: mātarā ca pitarā ca antaradhāyati putto.
anya-e0802n3:26_1: 312.Dūranti kaddha kāla nimmāna tvālopa disāyogavibhattārappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamāṇa pubbayogabandhana guṇavacana pañha kathana thokākattūsu ca.
anya-e0802n3:27_0: Dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, ārappayoge, suddhe, pamocane, hetvatthe, vivittatthe, pamāṇe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthe, guṇavacane, pañhe, kathane, thoke, akattari ca iccetesvatthesu, payogesu ca,
anya-e0802n3:28_0: Dūratthetāva – kīva dūro ito naḷakāragāmo, dūrato vā gamma,
anya-e0802n3:28_1: ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, dūraṁ gāmaṁ āvato, dūrena gāmena vā āgato. Ārakā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:29_0: Antikatthe – antikaṁ gāmā, āsannaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ saddhammā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, antikaṁ gāmaṁ, antikaṁ gāmena vā. Āsannaṁ gāmaṁ, āsannaṁ gāmena vā. Samīpaṁ gāmaṁ. Samīpaṁ gāmena vā. Samīpaṁ saddhammaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:30_0: Addhanimmāne – ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṁ nāma nagaraṁ atthi,
anya-e0802n3:31_0: Kālanimmāne – ito bhikkhave ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā loke udapādi,
anya-e0802n3:31_1: ito tiṇṇaṁ māsānaṁ accayena parinibbāyissati iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:32_0: Tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu – pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṁ abhiruhitvā vā. Pabbatā saṅkameyya, pabbataṁ abhiruhitvā vā. Hatthikkhandhā saṅkameyya,
anya-e0802n3:33_0: Disāyoge – avicito yāva uparibhavaggamantare bahū sattanikāyā vasanti, yato khemaṁ tato bhayaṁ, puratthimato, dakkhiṇato, pacchimato, uttarato aggī pajjalanti, yato assosuṁ bhagavantaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:34_0: Vibhatte – yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi. Chaṭṭhī ca, channavutīnaṁ pāsaṇḍānaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:35_0: Ārappayoge – gāmadhammā vasaladhammā asaddhammā ārati virati paṭivirati,
anya-e0802n3:36_1: mātito ca pitito ca suddho asaṁsaṭṭho anupakuddho agarahito iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:37_0: Pamocane – parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, muttosmi mārabandhanā,
anya-e0802n3:38_0: Hetvatthe – kasmā hetunā, kena hetunā, kissa hetunā,
anya-e0802n3:38_1: kasmā nu tumhaṁ daharā na mīyare,
anya-e0802n3:39_1: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:40_0: Pamāṇe – dīghaso navavidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
anya-e0802n3:42_0: Bandhanatthe – satasmā bandho naro. Tatiyā ca,
anya-e0802n3:42_1: satena bandho naro raññā iṇatthena iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:43_0: Guṇavacane – puññāya sugatiṁ yanti, cāgāya vipulaṁ dhanaṁ, paññāya vimuttimano,
anya-e0802n3:44_0: Pañhe tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu – abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṁ sutvā, abhidhamme ṭhatvā vā. Vinayā pucchanti, vinayaṁ sutvā, vinaye ṭhatvā vā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, abhidhammaṁ, abhidhammena vā. Vinayaṁ, vinayena vā. Eva suttā, geyyā, gāthāya, veyyākaraṇā, udānā, itivuttakā, jātakā, abbhutadhammā, vedallā iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:45_0: Kathane tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu – abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṁ sutvā, abhidhamme ṭhatvā vā. Vinayā kathayanti, vinayaṁ sutvā, vinaye ṭhatvā vā. Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, abhidhammaṁ, abhidhammena vā. Vinayaṁ vinayena vā. Evaṁ suttā, geyyā, gāthāya, veyyākaraṇā, udānā, itivuttakā, jātakā, abbhutadhammā, vedallā iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:46_0: Thoke – thokā muccanti. Appamattakā muccanti, kicchā muccanti. Tatiyā ca. Thokena, appamattakena, kicchena vā iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:47_0: Akattarica – kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppannaṁ hoti iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:48_0: Caggahaṇena sesesupi ye mayā nopadiṭṭhā apādānapayogikā,
anya-e0802n3:49_1: 302.Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṁ sampadānaṁ.
anya-e0802n3:50_0: Yassa vā dātukāmo yassa vārocate, yassa vā dhārayate,
anya-e0802n3:51_0: Samaṇassa cīvaraṁ dadāti, samaṇassa rocate saccaṁ,
anya-e0802n3:53_1: dhātunāmānaṁ payoge vā upasaggappayoge vā nipātappayoge vā sati atthavikappanatthaṁ vāti padaṁ payujjati.
anya-e0802n3:54_1: 303.Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhissosūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇa pubbakattārocanattha tadattha tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini, gatyatthakammani,
anya-e0802n3:55_0: Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duha issaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge, usūyatthānañca payoge, rādhikkhappayoge,
anya-e0802n3:55_1: paccāsuṇaanupatigiṇānaṁ pubbakattari, ārocanatthe , tadatthe, tumatthe, alamatthe,
anya-e0802n3:55_4: āsīsatthe ca sammuti bhiyya sattamyatthesu ca,
anya-e0802n3:56_0: Silāghappayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate, dhammassa silāghate, saṅghassa silāghate, sakaṁupajjhāyassa silāghate,
anya-e0802n3:57_0: Hanuppayoge – hanute tuyhameva, hanute mayhameva iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:58_1: bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya bhikkhunī iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:59_0: Sapappayoge – tuyhaṁ sapate, mayhaṁ sapate iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:61_0: Pihappayoge – buddhassa aññatitthiyā pihayanti, devā dassanakāmā te, yato icchāmi bhaddantassa,
anya-e0802n3:62_0: Kudhaduhaissausūyappayoge – kodhayati deva dattassa, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṁ vinassa idaṁ. Duhayati disānaṁ megho,
anya-e0802n3:63_0: Rādha ikkha iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge yassa akathitassa pucchanaṁ kammavikkhyāpanatthañca,
anya-e0802n3:63_1: taṁ kārakaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ hoti, dutiyā ca.
anya-e0802n3:64_0: Ārādhohaṁ rañño, ārādhohaṁ rājānaṁ, kyāhaṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi, kyāhaṁ ayye aparajjhāmi,
anya-e0802n3:64_1: cakkhuṁ janassa dassanāya taṁ viya maññe,
anya-e0802n3:64_2: āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṁ vā iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:65_0: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṁ pubbakattari suṇotissa paccāyoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n3:67_2: so‘bhagavā’ti ‘‘yo karoti sa kattā’’ti suttavacanena kattusañño.
anya-e0802n3:67_3: Evaṁ yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n3:68_1: Te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū.
anya-e0802n3:69_0: Giṇassa anupatiyoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n3:76_0: Ārocanatthe – ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave, ārocayāmi te mahārāja, āmantayāmi te mahārāja,
anya-e0802n3:77_0: Tadatthe – ūnassa pāripūriyā taṁ cīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ. Buddhassa atthāya, dhammassa atthāya, saṅghassa atthāya,
anya-e0802n3:78_0: Tumatthe -lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ buddho loke uppajjati.
anya-e0802n3:79_0: Alamatthappayoge-alamiti arahati paṭikkhittesu. Alaṁ me buddho, alaṁ me rajjaṁ, alaṁ bhikkhu pattassa, alaṁ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
anya-e0802n3:80_0: Maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini-kaṭṭhassa tuvaṁ maññe, kaliṅgarassa tuvaṁ maññe.
anya-e0802n3:81_0: Anādareti kimatthaṁ? Suvaṇṇaṁ viya taṁ maññe.
anya-e0802n3:83_0: Gatyatthakammani-gāmassa pādena gato, nagarassa pādena gato, appo saggāya gacchati, saggassa gamanena vā, mūlāya paṭikasseyya saṅgho. Dutiyā ca, gāmaṁ pādena gato, nagaraṁ pādena gato, appo saggaṁ gacchati, saggaṁ gamanena vā,
anya-e0802n3:84_0: Āsīsatthe-āyasmato dīghāyuko hotu, bhaddaṁ bhavato hotu, kusalaṁ bhavato hotu, anāmayaṁ bhavato hotu, sukhaṁ bhavato hotu, svāgataṁ bhavato hotu, attho bhavato hotu,
anya-e0802n3:85_0: Sammutippayoge– aññatra saṅghasammutiyā bhikkhussa vippavatthuṁ na vaṭṭati,
anya-e0802n3:85_1: sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya iccevamādi.
anya-e0802n3:89_0: Taṁ yathā? Upamaṁ mata karissāmi, dhammaṁ vo desessāmi.
anya-e0802n3:90_0: Sāratthe ca – desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ. Tassa phāsu vihārāya hoti, etassa pahiṇeyya, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, tathāpi tesaṁ byākarissāma , kappati samaṇānaṁ āyogo, amhākaṁ maṇinā attho, kimattho me buddhena, seyyo me attho,
anya-e0802n3:91_0: Sesesu akkharappayogesupi aññepi payogā payogavicakkhaṇehi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n3:92_1: Ye keci saddā sampadānappayogikā mayā nopadiṭṭhā,
anya-e0802n3:93_1: Bhikkhusaṅghassa pabhū ayaṁ bhagavā, desassa pabhū ayaṁ rājā.
anya-e0802n3:93_4: Kvaci dutiyā tatiyā pañcamī chaṭṭhī sattamyatthesu ca.
anya-e0802n3:95_0: Yo ādhāro, taṁ okāsasaññaṁ hoti. Svādhāro catubbidho byāpiko, opasilesiko, vesayiko sāmīpiko cāti.
anya-e0802n3:96_0: Tattha byāpiko tāva–jalesu khīraṁ tiṭṭhati, tilesu telaṁ, ucchūsu raso.
anya-e0802n3:97_0: Opasilesiko–pariyaṅke rājā seti, āsane upaviṭṭho saṅgho.
anya-e0802n3:98_0: Vesayiko–bhūmīsu manussā caranti, antalikkhe vāyū vāyanti. Ākāse sakuṇā pakkhandanti.
anya-e0802n3:99_0: Sāmīpiko–vane hatthino caranti, gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso tiṭṭhati, vaje gāvo duhanti,
anya-e0802n3:102_0: Yena vā kayirate, yena vā passati, yena vā suṇāti,
anya-e0802n3:103_0: Dattena vihiṁ lunāti, vāsiyā kaṭṭhaṁ tacchati, pharasunā rukkhaṁ chindati, kudālena pathaviṁ khaṇati, satthena kammaṁ karoti. Cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati.
anya-e0802n3:106_0: Yaṁ vā karoti, yaṁ vā passati, yaṁ vā suṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ kammasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n3:107_0: Chattaṁ karoti, rathaṁ karoti, rūpaṁ passati, saddaṁ suṇāti, kaṇṭakaṁ maddati, visaṁ gilati.
anya-e0802n3:111_0: Ahinā daṭṭho naro, garuḷena hato nāgo. Buddhena jito māro, upaguttena māro bandho.
anya-e0802n3:114_0: Yo kattāraṁ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā ca.
anya-e0802n3:115_0: So puriso taṁ purisaṁ kammaṁ kāreti so puriso tena purisena kammaṁ kāreti,
anya-e0802n3:115_1: so puriso tassa purisassa kammaṁ kāreti. Evaṁ hāreti pāṭheti pāceti, dhāreti.
anya-e0802n3:116_1: Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n3:118_0: Yassa vā pariggaho, taṁ sāmīsaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n3:119_0: Tassa bhikkhuno paṭivīso, tassa bhikkhuno patto, tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṁ, attano mukhaṁ.
anya-e0802n3:123_0: Puriso, purisā, eko, dve, ca, vā, he, ahe, re, are.
anya-e0802n3:125_0: Ālapanatthā dhike liṅgatthābhidhānamatte ca paṭhamāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n3:126_0: Bho purisa, bhavanto purisā, bho rāja, bhavanto rājāno, he sakhe, he sakhino.
anya-e0802n3:129_0: Agginā kuṭiṁ jhāpeti, manasā ce paduṭṭhena, manasā ce pasannena, kāyena kammaṁ karoti.
anya-e0802n3:132_0: Sahāpi gaggena saṅgho uposathaṁ kareyya, vināpi gaggena,
anya-e0802n3:132_1: mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ, sahassena samaṁ mitā.
anya-e0802n3:135_0: Raññā hato poso, yakkhena dinno varo, ahinā daṭṭho naro.
anya-e0802n3:138_0: Annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati, sakkārena vasati.
anya-e0802n3:141_1: yena samayena,) tena kho pana samayena.
anya-e0802n3:143_0: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate. Tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n3:144_0: Akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, kāṇaṁ passati nettena, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
anya-e0802n3:147_0: Gottena gotamo nātho, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo, tapasā uttamo.
anya-e0802n3:150_0: Buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā dānaṁ deti,
anya-e0802n3:150_1: dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā.
anya-e0802n3:153_0: Namo te buddha vīratthu, sotthi pajānaṁ, namo karohi nāgassa, svāgataṁ te mahārāja.
anya-e0802n3:156_0: Pāpā cittaṁ nivāraye, abbhā muttova candimā, bhayā muccati so naro.
anya-e0802n3:159_0: Ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ adassanā.
anya-e0802n3:162_0: Gāvaṁ hanati, vīhayo lunāti, satthaṁ karoti, ghaṭaṁ karoti, rathaṁ karoti, dhammaṁ suṇāti, buddhaṁ pūjeti, vācaṁ bhāsatī, taṇḍulaṁ vacati, coraṁ ghāteti.
anya-e0802n3:165_0: Māsaṁ maṁsodanaṁ bhuñjati, saradaṁ ramaṇīyā nadī, māsaṁ sajjhāyati, yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0802n3:169_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, pabbajitamanupabbajiṁsu.
anya-e0802n3:170_1: 286.Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṁ kārite vā.
anya-e0802n3:171_0: Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṁ payoge kārite dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā.
anya-e0802n3:172_0: Puriso purisaṁ (gāmaṁ) gāmayati, puriso purisena vā, puriso purisassa vā. Evaṁ bodhayati, bhojayati, pāṭhayati, hārayati, kārayati, sayāpayati. Evaṁ sabbattha kārite.
anya-e0802n3:175_0: Tassa bhikkhuno paṭivīso, tassa bhikkhuno patto, tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṁ, attano mukhaṁ.
anya-e0802n3:180_0: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhīpatibhū pasutakusala iccetehi payoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0802n3:181_0: Goṇānaṁ sāmī, goṇesu sāmī, goṇānaṁ issaro, goṇesu issaro. Goṇānaṁ adhipati, goṇesu adhipati. Goṇānaṁ dāyādo, goṇesu dāyādo. Goṇānaṁ sakkhī, goṇesu sakkhī, goṇānaṁ patibhū, goṇesu patibhū. Goṇānaṁ pasuto, goṇesu pasuto. Goṇānaṁ kusalo, goṇesu kusalo.
anya-e0802n3:183_0: Niddhāraṇatthe ca chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0802n3:184_1: kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā. Sāmā nārīnaṁ dassanīyatamā, sāmā nārīsu dassanīyatamā.
anya-e0802n3:184_2: Manussānaṁ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo.
anya-e0802n3:184_3: Pathikānaṁ dhāvanto sīghatamo, pathikesu dhāvanto sīghatamo.
anya-e0802n3:187_0: Rudato dārakassa pabbaji, rudantasmiṁ dārake pabbaji.
anya-e0802n3:190_0: Apissu maṁ aggivessana tisso upamā paṭibhaṁsu.
anya-e0802n3:192_0: Tatiyāsattamīnaṁ atthe ca kvaci dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n3:193_0: Sace maṁ samaṇo gotamo ālapissati, tvañca maṁ nābhibhāsasi. Evaṁ tatiyatthe.
anya-e0802n3:194_0: Pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā. Evaṁ sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n3:196_0: Tatiyāsattamīnaṁ atthe ca kvaci chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n3:197_0: Kato me kalyāṇo, kataṁ me pāpaṁ. Evaṁ tatiyatthe.
anya-e0802n3:198_1: kusalo tvaṁ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ. Evaṁ sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n3:199_1: Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, ānando atthesu vicakkhaṇo.
anya-e0802n3:202_0: Tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro, evaṁ dutiyatthe.
anya-e0802n3:203_1: kinnu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno,
anya-e0802n3:203_2: bhīto catunnaṁ āsīvisānaṁ ghoravisānaṁ, bhāyāmi ghoravisassa nāgassa. Evaṁ pañcamyatthe.
anya-e0802n3:206_0: Sundarāvuso ime ājīvakā bhikkhūsu abhivādenti. Evaṁ kammatthe.
anya-e0802n3:207_0: Hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti. Evaṁ karaṇatthe.
anya-e0802n3:208_0: Dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, evaṁ nimittatthe.
anya-e0802n3:211_0: Saṅghe dinnaṁ mahapphala, saṅghe gotamī dehi,
anya-e0802n3:211_1: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
anya-e0802n3:216_0: Kālabhāvesu ca kattari payujjamāne sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n3:217_1: Bhikkhūsu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato. Gosuduyhamānesu gato, duddhāsu āgato.
anya-e0802n3:220_0: Upa khāriyaṁ doṇo, upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṁ. Adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, adhi naccesu gotamī, adhi devesu buddho.
anya-e0802n3:223_0: Ñāṇena pasīdito, ñāṇasmiṁ vā pasīdito, ñāṇena ussukko,
anya-e0802n3:223_1: ñāṇasmiṁ vā ussukko tathāgato vā tathāgatagotto vā.
